0.name: Normal Attack
0.desc: The most basic type of attack.

1.name: Thrust
1.desc: Execute a swift and piercing thrust, aiming to swiftly neutralize the target.

2.name: Sword Dance
2.desc: Perform a mesmerizing display of swordsmanship, striking with grace and precision in a dazzling dance of blades.

3.name: Blade Storm
3.desc: Engage in a whirlwind of blades, striking multiple hits with deadly precision.

4.name: Fire Ball
4.desc: Casts a blazing orb of fire that deals significant damage upon impact.

5.name: Amethyst Bolt
5.desc: A radiant purple crystal projectile, dealing heavy magic damage to its target.

6.name: Lightning Strike
6.desc: Summon a devastating bolt of electricity from the sky.

7.name: Roar of Ferocity
7.desc: Unleash a thunderous roar, imbuing allies with increased strength and ferocity.

8.name: Poisonous Snake
8.desc: Spit a venomous serpent that bites the target with one of the most deadly poisons ever to exist.

9.name: Maelstrom Blast
9.desc: A fierce tempest that engulfs the battlefield with devastating power.

10.name: Dagger Strike
10.desc: A swift and precise attack with a dagger, dealing immediate damage and potentially causing a bleeding effect on the target.

11.name: Bloody Bite
11.desc: Inflicts severe bleeding, causing immediate damage and inducing a lingering blood loss effect over time.

12.name: Frostflare Spin
12.desc: The snow rabbit curls up and begins spinning, unleashing a storm of ice shards that pierce its enemies.

13.name: Ember
13.desc: Release a small flame that inflicts minor harm.

14.name: Inferno Rage
14.desc: The Ignis Dragon unleashes a devastating wave of fire, incinerating everything in its path with relentless fury.

15.name: Frost Spikes
15.desc: Shards of ice shoot from the attacker, flying swiftly towards the enemy to impale with freezing precision.

16.name: Toxic Strike
16.desc: The monster delivers a swift attack laced with poison, inflicting damage over time.

17.name: Pure Force
17.desc: A straightforward, solid attack that uses raw physical power to hit the enemy.

18.name: Pollen Burst
18.desc: Releases a cloud of pollen that engulfs enemies, causing irritation and confusion.

19.name: Heavy Punch
19.desc: A powerful, concentrated blow delivered with full force, capable of staggering or knocking back opponents.

20.name: Poison Attack
20.desc: Delivers a venomous strike that injects toxins into the enemy, dealing damage over time and weakening their defenses.

21.name: Fury Swipe
21.desc: A rapid series of claw attacks, slashing at the enemy with relentless speed and ferocity.

22.name: Ice Blast
22.desc: Unleashes a burst of frigid energy, freezing enemies on impact and dealing ice damage.

23.name: Gale Slash
23.desc: Summons fierce winds that slice through enemies, delivering cutting damage with razor-sharp gusts.

24.name: Bloody Rush
24.desc: The monster launches into a brutal charge, its horn piercing and tearing through the enemy, leaving a trail of blood in its wake.

25.name: Flame Pulse
25.desc: The dragon unleashes a quick wave of fire, dealing damage to nearby enemies.
